skills.name: Git Objects
skills.pattern: blob (file), tree (directory), commit, tag - content-addressable

skills.name: Git References
skills.pattern: HEAD, branches, tags - pointers to commits

skills.name: Reflog
skills.pattern: git reflog - recover lost commits, see HEAD history

skills.name: Git Flow
skills.pattern: main, develop, feature/*, release/*, hotfix/*

skills.name: Trunk-Based Development
skills.pattern: Main branch, short feature branches, feature flags

skills.name: GitHub Flow
skills.pattern: main + feature branches, PR for merge

skills.name: Merge Strategies
skills.pattern: merge commit, squash, rebase - each has tradeoffs

skills.name: Rebase vs Merge
skills.pattern: Rebase: linear history. Merge: preserve topology.

skills.name: Interactive Rebase
skills.pattern: git rebase -i HEAD~5 - squash, reorder, edit commits

skills.name: Conflict Resolution
skills.pattern: Understand both changes, choose/combine, test result

skills.name: Rerere
skills.pattern: git config rerere.enabled true - remember conflict resolutions

skills.name: Git Bisect
skills.pattern: git bisect start, good, bad - binary search for bug

skills.name: Git Blame
skills.pattern: git blame file.js - who changed each line, when

skills.name: Git Log Advanced
skills.pattern: git log --graph --oneline --all, --author, --since, -S

skills.name: Git Diff
skills.pattern: git diff HEAD~3, --staged, branch1..branch2, --stat

skills.name: Partial Staging
skills.pattern: git add -p - stage specific changes, not whole file

skills.name: Stashing
skills.pattern: git stash, stash pop, stash list, stash apply@{2}

skills.name: Git Clean
skills.pattern: git clean -fd - remove untracked files and directories

skills.name: Reset Modes
skills.pattern: soft (keep staged), mixed (unstage), hard (discard)

skills.name: Git Revert
skills.pattern: git revert SHA - create new commit that undoes changes

skills.name: Cherry-Pick
skills.pattern: git cherry-pick SHA - apply one commit to current branch

skills.name: Remote Management
skills.pattern: git remote add upstream URL, fetch, push to different remotes

skills.name: Tracking Branches
skills.pattern: git branch -u origin/main, --set-upstream-to

skills.name: Force Push Safely
skills.pattern: git push --force-with-lease - fails if remote changed

skills.name: Git Submodules
skills.pattern: git submodule add URL, update --init --recursive

skills.name: Git Subtree
skills.pattern: git subtree add --prefix lib URL main - simpler workflow

skills.name: Git Hooks
skills.pattern: pre-commit, pre-push, commit-msg - custom scripts

skills.name: Husky Setup
skills.pattern: npx husky install, npx husky add .husky/pre-commit 'npm test'

skills.name: Git Worktrees
skills.pattern: git worktree add ../feature-branch feature-branch

skills.name: Git LFS
skills.pattern: git lfs track '*.psd', store large files outside repo
